original_text: And the two doors were of fir tree: the two leaves of the one door were folding, and the two leaves of the other door were folding.
korean_text: 그 두 문짝은 잣나무라 이쪽 문짝도 두 짝으로 접게 되었고 저쪽 문짝도 두 짝으로 접게 되었으며

sentences.original_text: And the two doors were of fir tree
two leaves of the one door were folding
sentences.korean_translation: 한 문의 두 판은 접히게 만들어졌고

sentences.original_text: and the two leaves of other door were folding
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 문의 두 판도 접히게 만들어졌습니다
